profileAlternative.name: Simon Marlow
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineer at Facebook
profileAlternative.summary:
Co-author of the Glasgow Haskell Compiler (GHC), and author of its parallel runtime system.

Author of "Parallel and Concurrent Programming in Haskell" (O'Reilly) 2013.

Chair of the Haskell 2010 language committee.

Winner of the ACM Programming Languages Software Award, 2011, along with Simon Peyton Jones, for GHC.

Author of many other Haskell-related tools and libraries, including Happy, Alex, Haddock, ThreadScope, monad-par, and async.

I have authored and co-authored a number of papers on subjects including parallel garbage collection, language design, and concurrency (see http://simonmar.github.io/bib/bib.html).
